description: People now have to wear a mask in outdoor public places, as France fights a surge in new infections.
title: France Covid-19: Paris compulsory face-mask rule comes into force
title_page: France Covid-19: Paris compulsory face-mask rule comes into force - BBC News
maintext: Mask-wearing has taken over the streets of Paris by stealth over the past few months, and the blanket enforcement of face masks in and around the capital from 08:00 triggered little real outcry, except for one thing: the new rules were originally designed to apply to cyclists and runners, along with pedestrians.
